catchgame

Class FishingActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • catchgame.FishingActivity

  • public class FishingActivity
extends java.lang.Object
    This is responsible for sending info to the server about the ClientSubOcean conditions, receiving SeaCreature packets, adding them to the screen, and providing action events for when a seaCreature is caught.
    Author:
    Matt Roberts

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  FishingActivity.ClientSubOcean
      For keeping track of all the SeaCreatures on the client's side.
      private class  FishingActivity.ExtractFishAction
      Action that occurs when a fish is caught.
      private class  FishingActivity.ExtractShellfishAction
      Action that occurs when a shellfish is caught.
      (package private) class  FishingActivity.UpdateFishOnScreenTask
      Requests new SeaCreatures from Server, and adds them to the screen if any are sent

      private FishingActivity.ClientSubOcean clientSubOcean 
      private java.io.ObjectInputStream fromServer 
      private GamePane gamePane 
      private Player player 
      private java.io.ObjectOutputStream toServer

      Constructors

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFishPacketToScreen(java.util.ArrayList<Fish> fishUpdate, int topOffset, int bottomOffset, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Adds fish to the screen between the topOffset and bottomOffset and of the given color
      void addFishToScreen(Fish fish, int topOffset, int bottomOffset, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Adds an individual fish to the screen between the topOffset and bottomOffset and of the given color
      void addShellfishPacketToScreen(java.util.ArrayList<Shellfish> shellfishUpdate, int topOffset, int bottomOffset, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Adds shellfish to the screen between the topOffset and bottomOffset and of the given color
      void addShellfishToScreen(Shellfish shellfish, int topOffset, int bottomOffset, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Adds an individual shellfish to the screen between the topOffset and bottomOffset and of the given color
      Packets.SeaCreaturesPacket getUpdateSeaCreaturesPacketFromServer()
      Actually makes the request for new SeaCreatures from the server and sends a new ClientSubOceanSeaCreatureStatePacket so that the server can no what to send, listens for SeaCreatures sent from server and returns any
      private void updateSeaCreaturesOnScreen()
      Gets a SeaCreaturesPacket from the server, and adds all the Sea Creatures to the screen, and increments the ClientSubOcean count for all the SeaCreatures added

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • FishingActivity

        public FishingActivity(GamePane gamePane,
                       java.io.ObjectOutputStream toServer,
                       java.io.ObjectInputStream fromServer,
                       Player player)
        This constructs a FishingActivity by putting SeaCreatures on the screen.
        Parameters:
        gamePane - the gamepane where the FishingActivity's UI will be held
        toServer - an ObjectOutputStream to the server
        fromServer - an ObjectInputStream from the server
        player - the player who will be affected by the user fishing

    • Method Detail

      • updateSeaCreaturesOnScreen

        private void updateSeaCreaturesOnScreen()
        Gets a SeaCreaturesPacket from the server, and adds all the Sea Creatures to the screen, and increments the ClientSubOcean count for all the SeaCreatures added

      • getUpdateSeaCreaturesPacketFromServer

        public Packets.SeaCreaturesPacket getUpdateSeaCreaturesPacketFromServer()
        Actually makes the request for new SeaCreatures from the server and sends a new ClientSubOceanSeaCreatureStatePacket so that the server can no what to send, listens for SeaCreatures sent from server and returns any
        Returns:
        The SeaCreatures sent by the server

      • addFishPacketToScreen

        public void addFishPacketToScreen(java.util.ArrayList<Fish> fishUpdate,
                                  int topOffset,
                                  int bottomOffset,
                                  javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
        Adds fish to the screen between the topOffset and bottomOffset and of the given color
        Parameters:
        fishUpdate - the fish to add to the screen
        topOffset - the highest the fish can be on the screen
        bottomOffset - the lowest the fish can be on the screen
        color - the color the fish should be given

      • addShellfishPacketToScreen

        public void addShellfishPacketToScreen(java.util.ArrayList<Shellfish> shellfishUpdate,
                                       int topOffset,

                                       javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
        Adds shellfish to the screen between the topOffset and bottomOffset and of the given color
        Parameters:

        topOffset - the highest the shellfish can be on the screen
        bottomOffset - the lowest the shellfish can be on the screen
        color - the color the shellfish should be given
